amendment.description: To make appropriations available for the Chief Financial Officer of the Department of Homeland Security to ensure compliance with the Improper Payments Information Act of 2002 (31 U.S.C. 3321 note).

vote.text: Amendment SA 4590 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4590 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S7373-7374; text: CR S7374) To make appropriations available for the Chief Financial Officer of the Department of Homeland Security to ensure compliance with the Improper Payments Information Act of 2002 (31 U.S.C. 3321 note).
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4590 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4590 proposed by Senator Coburn.
